title: EMSE 6035: Marketing Analytics for Design Decisions
text:
This is the course website for the EMSE graduate course “Marketing Analytics for Design Decisions” at the George Washington University. The course teaches analytical tools to inform design decisions in an uncertain, competitive market; topics include consumer choice modeling, programming in the R programming language, survey design, conjoint analysis, optimization, market simulation, and professional communication skills.
Choose from the menu to view the course site for a particular semester or to view the showcase of prior student projects.

title: Licensing and copyright information
text: The course material is licensed under the Creative Commons ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

title: About
text: This course was first created by Dr. John Paul Helveston at the George Washington University for the Spring 2019 semester of EMSE 6035, which was previously called Marketing of Technology. See the LICENSE page for information about reusing and sharing content.
